posts.post_content: This was one of my favourite cards in Ravnica block limited. It can steal otherwise lost games from your opponent in a way even most experienced players won't usually suspect. The effect is just too unique. I remember winning with it a seemingly lost game against a growing army of flyers off a Leafdrake Roost and praying for the last creature needed to come out for my opponent so I can finish him with this card. What's more, you can "tutor" with it another 6 mana bomb from your deck ( playing more 6 mana cards in a limited deck isn't always a great idea though) - [Hex](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Hex), for example, is in the same format. Really an excellent card, only sometimes a bit unfair.
posts.html:
